name: Forgotten Robo-Spider [A mini metroidvania]
description:
- Story -

In the future, a little spider robot wakes up from its sleep in an abandoned building, not knowing what happened or what is that place, it decides to escape the place by exploring around, climbing on ceilings and unlocking new abilities.

Little metroidvanina game for the Platformer Challenge game jam; theme: Climbing.

This is not an story based game, just a little backstory for a simple game.

- Basic Controls -
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Jump 
 - Credits -
  • Music, Game art, Animation and Programming by Bored Cube (me)
  • Free SFX from Pixabay.com
  • Font by  Zacchary Dempsey-Plante
